Class RobotJoints.Joint

java.lang.Object
  RobotJoints.Joint
Enclosing class:
RobotJoints
public class RobotJoints.Joint
extends java.lang.Object

Class describing a single joint of the UMI-RTX robot in Denavit-Hartenberg notation. Its elements will not be explained further, see Leo's syllabus.

Version:
$Id: RobotJoints.java,v 1.3 2007/05/25 12:11:51 obooij Exp $
Author:
Matthijs Spaan

name

public java.lang.String name
Name of this joint. Possible values are "zed", "shoulder", "elbow", "yaw", "pitch", "roll" or "gripper".
